Action.author: rajanashutosh
Action.body: Also attached logs as required after {{kill -SIGABRT ^SIG_KILL.txt }}

Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: go routine 391 is waiting to acquire the lock associated with the blockfileMgr.cpInfoCond condition variable. This looks like it may be FAB-11094 or at least related.

Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: FAB-11094 was not included in 1.2.0 but merged into the release-1.2 tree.

Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: If 1.2.1 does not resolve the issue, please reopen and provide updated logs that include the go routines after signally the peer.

Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: This appears to be FAB-11094. If, after pulling down 1.2.1, you continue to see this problem, please signal the deadlocked peer and collect goroutine dumps.

Action.author: rajanashutosh
Action.body: ~sykesm ~denyeart ^Qscc_18_09_2018_issue.txt ^Error_SIGABRT_18_09_2018.logs - We tested out as told above with Fabric version 1.2.1 and found that issue still persists. Attached logs.

Action.author: rajasushanth
Action.body: Facing the same issue, Fyi I'm using 1.2.1 version. Attached the goroutine dumps ^qscc_error.txt

Action.author: manish-sethi
Action.body: ~rajanashutosh - I see the same stack in your logs as well...so the above comment is applicable to your environment as well.

Action.author: rajasushanth
Action.body: ~sykesm I have pulled the images as per this comment|https://jira.hyperledger.org/browse/FAB-11720?focusedCommentId=49666&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-49666

Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: Please check again to make sure the peers that you're testing with are using the 1.2.1 image. Thanks.

Action.author: mastersingh24
Action.body: ~sykesm - Do we know if this is still an issue?

Action.author: sykesm
Action.body: ~mastersingh24 I believe this issue was resolved in 1.3. Other than this one, I haven't seen any reports to the contrary.
